transcript:
Haan, hello.
Hello.
Hello, hello.
Sameer ji namaskar.
Uh, aap humko 10-15 minute mein call kijiye. Gaadi pe hai, traffic mein hai. 10 minute ke baad call kijiye, baat karte hai.
Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a call back in 10-15 minutes.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, traffic
